content.en: Sparse-view CT reconstruction: Researchers are exploring the use of various algorithms, such as deep learning-based methods, multi-level wavelet convolutional neural networks, and end-to-end deep networks, to improve the reconstruction of sparse-view CT images. They are also comparing the performance of different deep learning-based image reconstruction methods for low-dose and sparse-angle CT. These algorithms aim to enhance the quality of CT images by reconstructing them directly from sparse sinograms or by reducing artifacts and improving image quality.
content.da: Sparse-view CT rekonstruktion: Forskere undersøger brugen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom dybdelæringsbaserede metoder, fler-niveau wavelet konvolutionelle neurale netværk og end-to-end dybe netværk, for at forbedre rekonstruktionen af sparse-view CT billeder. De sammenligner også ydeevnen af forskellige dybdelæringsbaserede billedrekonstruktionsmetoder til lavdosis og sparse-vinkel CT. Disse algoritmer har til formål at forbedre kvaliteten af CT billeder ved at rekonstruere dem direkte fra sparse sinogrammer eller ved at reducere artefakter og forbedre billedkvaliteten.
